TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlObjectReader extends System.Xaml.XamlReader

summary.span: 提供一个 实现，该实现读取对象图并生成 XAML 节点流。

span.span: Provides a implementation that reads object graphs and generates a XAML node stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用在你想要处理对象图的情况下，这是通常的应用程序最初从 XAML 源生成的对象图。Use the in scenarios where you want to process an object graph, which is typically the object graph of an application that is originally generated from a XAML source. 你可以使用往返行程从 XAML 起始点进行到 XAML 终结点。You might use the where a round trip is made from a XAML start point to a XAML end point. 或者，你可能会运行通过对象图中; 处理中间的 XAML 节点流中，如果它必需的在使用 Api 的和; 然后使用要序列化到 XML 的 XAML 节点。Or you might run a over the object graph; process the intermediate XAML node stream, if it is required, by using APIs on and ; and then use to serialize XAML nodes to XML. 提供更高级的方案可能替代和特定的 XAML 架构上下文，使用并随后将传递到编写器替代。More advanced scenarios might supply a override and a specific XAML schema context that the uses and then passes to the writer override. 使用所需的典型应用场景调用的成员实现; 它们还调用， ，和从基类。Typical scenarios for using call the members that implements; they also call , , and from the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回非 null 结果仅当属性的当前读取器位置是。This property returns a non-null result only if the property of the current reader position is . 它无法推断基于其他节点类型，例如该命名空间中的对象的上下文的命名空间。It does not infer a namespace that is based on the context of other node types, such as an object in that namespace.

span.span: Gets the type of the current node.
The type of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用时Api，你通常情况下检查之后可能的位置向前移动读取器，如每个操作的属性， ，或方法。When using the APIs, you typically check the property after every operation that potentially advances the reader position, such as the , , or methods. 指示可以获取从当前读取器位置和下一步调用的方法的信息。 indicates the information that you can obtain from the current reader position and the methods that you call next. 例如，可能会访问， ， ，或属性; 也可能调用方法如果你不感兴趣的当前节点类型的内容。For example, you might access the , , , or properties; or you might call the method if you are not interested in the contents of the current node type.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SchemaContext As XamlSchemaContext
public: virtual property System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ SchemaContext { System::Xaml::XamlSchemaContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象提供信息集的架构信息。

span.span: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象提供信息集的架构信息。

span.span: An object that provides schema information for the information set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 架构上下文是在传统意义上，架构和处理的 XAML 架构概念的特定 XAML 处理器 （分析、 读取和写入操作） 之间的概念中介。The schema context is a conceptual intermediary between a schema in the conventional sense, and the handling of XAML schema concepts by particular XAML processors (parsing, reading, and writing operations).
